event.description: Jody Gerut flies out to left fielder Carlos Lee.
David Eckstein grounds out, catcher Ivan Rodriguez to first baseman Darin Erstad.
Adrian Gonzalez pops out to third baseman Jeff Keppinger.
Chase Headley singles on a line drive to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Scott Hairston grounds into a double play, second baseman Kazuo Matsui to shortstop Miguel Tejada to first baseman Darin Erstad. Chase Headley out at 2nd.
Kevin Kouzmanoff grounds out, second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Darin Erstad.
Nick Hundley walks.
Chris Burke flies out to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Josh Geer pops out to first baseman Darin Erstad in foul territory.
Jody Gerut flies out to center fielder Michael Bourn.
David Eckstein hit by pitch.
Adrian Gonzalez flies out to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Chase Headley homers (3) on a fly ball to right field. David Eckstein scores.
Scott Hairston doubles (8) on a line drive to left fielder Carlos Lee.
Kevin Kouzmanoff strikes out swinging.
Nick Hundley called out on strikes.
Chris Burke pops out to second baseman Kazuo Matsui.
Edgar Gonzalez grounds out, third baseman Jeff Keppinger to first baseman Darin Erstad.
Jody Gerut strikes out swinging.
Luis Antonio Rodriguez singles on a ground ball to right fielder Hunter Pence.

Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Brian Giles replaces Luis Perdomo.
Brian Giles singles on a fly ball to right fielder Hunter Pence.
Nick Hundley walks. Brian Giles to 2nd.
With Chris Burke batting, wild pitch by Roy Oswalt, Brian Giles to 3rd. Nick Hundley to 2nd.

Adrian Gonzalez reaches on a fielding error by second baseman Kazuo Matsui. Luis Antonio Rodriguez to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Alberto Arias replaces Tim Byrdak, batting 9th.
Chase Headley lines into a double play, pitcher Alberto Arias to first baseman Darin Erstad. Adrian Gonzalez out at 1st.
Pitching Change: Chris Sampson replaces Alberto Arias, batting 9th, replacing Jason Michaels.
Scott Hairston flies out to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Henry Blanco replaces Duaner Sanchez.
Henry Blanco walks.
Nick Hundley grounds into a double play, third baseman Jeff Keppinger to second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Darin Erstad. Henry Blanco out at 2nd.
Defensive Substitution: Geoff Blum replaces left fielder Carlos Lee, batting 4th, playing first base.
Defensive switch from first base to left field for Darin Erstad.
Chris Burke singles on a fly ball to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Edgar Gonzalez grounds into a double play, third baseman Jeff Keppinger to second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Geoff Blum. Chris Burke out at 2nd.

Ivan Rodriguez walks. Darin Erstad to 2nd.

Michael Bourn grounds out, shortstop Luis Antonio Rodriguez to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez. Kazuo Matsui to 2nd.
With Hunter Pence batting, wild pitch by Luis Perdomo, Kazuo Matsui to 3rd.
San Diego Padres second baseman David Eckstein left the game due to an injured chest.
